title: Attraction
description: A stunning new novel featuring the characters from the Temptation books...Have you ever thought you knew exactly where your life was headed?Carly enjoys her carefree life — free from obstructions, free from drama, and free from anchors that tie her down to anyone or anything. She likes making her own decisions and not having to answer to anyone. Her life is good. Uncomplicated.But Carly is set for a shake-up when she is introduced to Derek at her best friend’s birthday. Firefighter-Derek. Drop-dead-gorgeous-Derek. Brown-eyed-dirty-talking-cocky-as-hell-Derek. Their instant attraction has them both questioning their outlook on life, on relationships ... and on love.Please note: Attraction can be read as a stand-alone novel. However, character development may be limited if you choose not to read the other books first.
author: K.M. Golland
